00060     uint16_t crom_serial;         /* Configuration ROM Serial number */

00066 typedef struct FlashAccess {
00067   int            Handle;         // CAENComm handle for board access
00068   unsigned long  RW_Flash;       // Address of the R/W Flash Register
00069   unsigned long  Sel_Flash;      // Address of the Select Flash Register
00070   unsigned long  FlashEnable;    // Flash Enable pin polarity
00071   unsigned int   RegSize;        // Register Data Size (2 = D16, 4 = D32)
00072   unsigned int   PageSize;       // Flash Page Size
00073 } cvFlashAccess;

00075 typedef enum cvupgrade_ErrorCode {
00076 /* Error Types */
